Title: 1. People
Write-Up Text: People on Twitter have been discussing the upcoming budget and speculating on what it might hold. They have expressed varying opinions and preferences with some questioning the government's approach to recommendations related to women's equality and economic inclusion. Others have highlighted the importance of tax breaks and childcare subsidies to encourage female workers while urging the government to raise GST to balance the budget. A few people have also commented on the Insiders show criticizing the clothing choices of some of the panelists. They have praised Amanda Rishworth for acknowledging government errors and taking appropriate action.
